document.full_text: arcelormittal , the world's largest steelmaker, forecast strong prices and shipments that would propel earnings to a post-crisis high in the second quarter following a sharp rebound at the start of the year.
document.title: arcelormittal forecast post-crisis peak in q2
lines_and_colors: arcelormittal , the world's largest steelmaker, forecast strong prices and shipments that would propel earnings to a post-crisis high in the second quarter following a sharp rebound at the start of the year.
